alert.note: Alert for Carter; Jefferson; Love; Murray; Stephens (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 15 at 9:32PM CDT until June 15 at 10:15PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Jefferson County in southern Oklahoma... Northwestern Love County in southern Oklahoma... Southern Stephens County in southern Oklahoma... Western Carter County in southern Oklahoma... West central Murray County in southern Oklahoma... * Until 1015 PM CDT. * At 932 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 5 miles south of Duncan to 3 miles northwest of Sugden, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Duncan, Waurika, Lone Grove, Healdton, Wilson, Comanche, Ringling, Ryan, Velma, Hastings, Loco, Ratliff City, Addington, Leon, Sugden, Graham, Grady, Corum, Milo, and Oscar. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
